lists.title: Responsibilities
lines: Advising, designing, maintaining and optimizing cloud environments of our clients
Configuring and developing automated and scalable infrastructures
Delivering technical trainings and workshop to developers and architects
Determining a short and long-term strategy with our clients to reach their innovative goals
Translating business challenges from clients to technical solutions

lists.title: Achievements
lines: Implemented a dependency graph to parallelize deployments resulting in a 6x improvement
Developed framework to monitor and report security compliance in real-time across workloads
Implemented continuous integration and deployment pipeline for Docker containers
Enabled developers within an enterprise to migrate multiple applications to public cloud
Automated build and distribution process of custom machine images across multiple accounts

lists.title: Responsibilities
lines: Developing new back-end features for marketplace and back office

Operating cloud infrastructure for continuous deployment

lists.title: Achievements
lines: Developed access right system for more granular adjustability of user permissions
Improved integration with bookkeeping software to reduce workload of Finance department by 5h/week
Implemented search function with Elasticsearch to solve issues with geographical aggregations
Solved bug in category tree structure to reduce query time from >20s to 0.2s

lists.title: Responsibilities
lines: Designing database structure and optimizing SQL queries

Integrating JavaScript front-end with PHP back-end
Researching new technologies and business opportunities
Operating cloud infrastructure for continuous deployment

lists.title: Achievements
lines: Replaced PHP code from a CMS by an optimized SQL query to reduce page load time from 8s to 0.8s
Restructured cache usage of ACL to reduce base memory usage per request from 80MB to 16MB
Developed integration between VoIP system and web app to relay customer information based on caller ID
Implemented Elasticsearch for webshop with 8.000 products in customer-specific catalogs
Migrated web applications from shared hosting at multiple external parties to AWS
